author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
If you haven't traveled recently, you may be shocked at the drastic changes in Airport security as implemented by the TSA. From now on, everything is driven by Facial Recognition Technology. You may even be more surprised that western countries are doing the same. This is being standardized.

Beyond this, you will read what the TSA states on their website and I will show you that there's more going on. The TSA claims that photos are not used for surveillance but only for "Document Authentication". Yet the signs show that we're being lied to.

title: Who Needs Passports?! Airport Security Now Fully Based on  Facial Recognition
